html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10692024-10-04ECCC
ActMigratory Birds Convention Act, 1994
SubjectRegulations Amending the Migratory Birds Regulations, 2022 (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the MIGRATORY BIRDS REGULATIONS, 2022 (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) correct a minor error in the English version of the Regulations which were published in Canada Gazette, Part II on June 19, 2024; and (2) specify that in Provincial Wildlife Management Units 88 to 95, the daily bag limit for ducks is 6 and not more than 1 may be Barrow's Goldeneye and not more than 3 may be American Black Ducks, as correctly specified in the French version.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0197 Publication Date: 2024-10-23
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the MIGRATORY BIRDS REGULATIONS, 2022 (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) correct a minor error in the English version of the Regulations which were published in Canada Gazette, Part II on June 19, 2024; and (2) specify that in Provincial Wildlife Management Units 88 to 95, the daily bag limit for ducks is 6 and not more than 1 may be Barrow's Goldeneye and not more than 3 may be American Black Ducks, as correctly specified in the French version.
